name: 60 RPS
description:
Follow the platforming adventures of Reginald Wufterfuddle, Dandy Fop, as his worst nightmare yet unfolds: His vintage tabletop Victrola has been cursed, and he has been shrunk down inside his favorite vinyl record! Only his quick thinking and powerful jumps will allow him to avoid his dastardly foes, ravenous dust bunnies and atrocious needle-hawks! Help Reginald reach the end of the record before the song runs out, or else he’ll be forced to go through the vicious cycle again!

Remember, if you ever need to think a difficult platforming section through, you can always pause the game to plan out your next steps.

@retr0titan: Artist and animator

@lapspider45: Playtester and playlist consultant

@gavinlochtefeld: Game Design and Lead Programmer

Works created ahead of Jam time:

Main menu audio: Edward Elgar - The Crown of India, Op. 66 - 3. Warriors' Dance.
Performed by the United States Marine Band.
Licensed from musopen.org under CC-PD.
